QuestData.Title: Making the Horn
QuestData.Description: My people have been hunting the giant yeti of these hills for generations and I will be participating for the first time this year. It will probably be the last before we leave the post forever.$B$BTo prepare for the hunt, I must fashion a loud horn from the horns of the dire rams that roam the snowy areas near our camp. The elders tell me the sound mimics the mating call of the female yeti, but I have my doubts.$B$BBring me the best dire ram horns you can find, $n, and I'll select one from among them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Nokoma Snowseer at Camp Winterhoof wants you to bring her 6 Undamaged Ram Horns.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you brought any suitable horns?
QuestData.RewardText: These are all fine horns, $n. Let me examine them and select the one I will use in the hunt.$B$BI'll give the rest to the craftsmen for use in their carvings.
